dynamicContents.content: The rating goes from the best rating S+ down to  F-. Each player has it's own rating, which shows how good a player is performing on the current world.

The rating a player becomes depends on an internal (not visible) value. Each players starts with a value of 10'000 points when joining a world. Each day and when ever another team finish the world (infinity worlds only) the rating of the player gets reduced.

While every player has his own rating, players in a team gets the same rating based on the ratings of each team member. If a player with a S rating plays in a team with a B rated player they both get a A rating instead.
